title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Visitor Centers
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Visitor Centers              Visitor Center        Catoctin Mountain Park is open all year. NPS Photo   Â   The visitor center contains a small exhibit area with information about past area industries, the development of the park, and a collection of preserved local wildlife.  Eastern National provides a small bookstore for your interest.  Restrooms and a small auditorium for programs are also available. Phone (301) 663-9388. Visitor Center Hours. Watch for alerts announcing temporary closures.   Directions to the visitor center.
